entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023
